MAN.TITLE: G_make

PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: : a character string or a vector of character string.
: vector of character string. Rfiles can be used as a first argument when calling addinter function.

DESCRIPTION.P: On Unix like systems G_make calls the make utility for building target files and returns the value of files in the variable Rfiles. On windows platforms, G_make calls the nmake utility for building target dllname and it returns the value of dllname in the variable Rfiles. Of course G_make will work if apropriate Makefiles are provided in the current Scilab directory.
G_make can be used to provide OS independant call to addinter.
